title: () - N205

title: (4720-071) Ferreiros - 1 Rua Augusto José Machado

title: (4830) Verim - Unnamed Road

title: (4720) Paredes Secas - 66 EM535-2
description: Leave the place with a beautiful view surrounded by mountains. it is safe because it is close to homes, but not so close that it is uncomfortable for you or the neighborhood. you have fresh water 50 meters in the church or in the cemetery. It also has a Roman road called Geira.

title: (4710) Navarra - Rua do Passadiço
description: At the edge of the water at the bottom of a dead end. Very nice view of the water. Passage of some fishermen but calm night. No service

description: Capela de Santo Ovídio

title: (4715) Pedralva -
description: Dreyfus vir ff

title: (4830) Rendufinho - 33 EM597
description: Village picnic area with 3 very good stone picnic tables. It has two small garbage containers, a fountain, a children's play area and a barbecue. You can't swim in the pond but it is pleasant.

title: (4720) - 9 Rua de Santa Maria
description: Parking area (flat) with tables, drinking water, bins and bbq. Separated from the main road although there is still some road noise. Still a peaceful spot with lots of fruit trees and a small park area attached. 100m from the monastery and local bar.

title: (4830-513) Póvoa de Lanhoso - 267 Rua Jorge Amado
title_short: (4830-513) Póvoa de Lanhoso - 267 Rua Jorge Amado
description: Second laundromat in town. See photos for prices. Washing machines are available in sizes, but no weight information is provided. You can also pay with bills

title: (4720) Braga - 204 Rua de Terreiro
description: A simple and free parking lot, near mosteiro de Santa Maria do bouro, and close the restaurant “O cruzeiro” famous for “Papas de sarrabulho” (a must in Minhota region), there’s also a playground, bakery and butcher nearby. It’s allowed to park at night but there might be some traffic noise.

title: (4710) Adaúfe - Rua da Praia Fluvial
description: Leisure center near a river

title: (4830) - Rua de Fradelos
description: It's a parking lot of an (old) soccer field, near the street but there are very few people and cars. The next village is far enough to have a quite night.

title_short: (4830) Póvoa de Lanhoso - 22 Rua Doutor Custódio António Silva
description: CAMPO DA FEIRA - quiet area, 5 minutes from the center, with shadows, with a large flow of water, paved. Note: banned at the fifth feira, the day of the feira, from 8 am to 8 pm.

title_short: (4830-520) Póvoa de Lanhoso - 8 Praça Engenheiro Armando Rodrigues

title: () - Rua de Portela
description: On top of a mountain with fantastic view. Some tables provided, plenty space. Perfect for sunset and sunrise. Good to stay for a night. Follow the sign "Miradouro" at N103, 2 km on a pebble stone road to the top.

title: (4830-574) Póvoa de Lanhoso - 167 Rua da Veiga
title_short: (4830-574) Póvoa de Lanhoso - 167 Rua da Veiga

title: (4830-574) Póvoa de Lanhoso - 219 Rua da Veiga
title_short: (4830-574) Póvoa de Lanhoso - 219 Rua da Veiga

description: Parking next to Intermarché, shaded, quite quiet at night although roadside, picnic tables

title: (4720) Rendufe - 947 EM567
description: Below the road right next to the bridge, riverside, but a lot of car traffic.We stayed there, no problem.ok for camping car.No service.

title: () - EM595-1
description: Small car park next to the river, in Praia fluvial quinta do rio. Parking for two motorhomes. No services.

title: (4720) Lago - Unnamed Road
description: Around the remains of an old mill is this river beach equipped with numerous tables for picnics. Very shady place and with the possibility of taking a bath in the river that flows calmly. Parking for 15 small vehicles. Possibility of large AC but not at peak times, on holidays crowds of locals come. Flat ground. quiet night

title: (4830) - N103
description: Lay-by at side of road with tree. Nice little spot but obviously close to the road.

title: (4715) Braga - Largo do Santuário do Bom Jesus
title_short: (4715) Braga - Largo do Santuário do Bom Jesus
description: Parking spot in Bom Jezus area in Braga.

address.street: Largo do Santuário do Bom Jesus

title: (4710-057) Braga - 24 Rua Velha de Barros
description: Water Fountain

title: (4715) Braga - 77 Estrada de São Pedro
description:
Car park for the Bom Jesus sanctuary funicular. Come in the evening after closing to have a free space. About 5 comfortable places under the trees. close to the ascent of the sanctuary on foot with its 577 steps. A magnificent sunset at the top.
Self-service/free/no amenities parking. peaceful for the night. Pure vida!

title: (4715) Braga - 8 Caminho do Sameiro
description:
Another parking lot at the Bom Jesus. There is an automatic gate. We asked a park guard and he admitted we could stay for some days. 
At the park you'll find picnic tables, small lake with boats, playground, bar with sandwiches, ice cream and free toilets.

title: (4715) Braga - Av. da Igreja
description: Free and quiet parking. There are rubbish bins and a playground with WC. Drinking water source in the park but it is not good for recharging water. Next to the cemetery and with little traffic. The main parking spaces are too small for large motorhomes but these could be parked next to the playground.

title: (4730-263) Lanhas - 4 Rua Augusto Sousa Antunes
description: Quiet and safe motorhome and poids lours

title: (4720) - EM1248
description: Parking lot of the Abadia monastery. a large car park before arriving (where we parked for the night - a little sloping) and a small, higher, flat and shaded parking lot. WC nearby and water fountain. Very nice quiet site.

title: (4700) Braga - N309
description: Small area of land on one side of the road with panoramic views of the city of Braga. It is on the side of the road so it can be noisy, although it is a road that does not have much traffic.

title: (4715) Braga - Largo do Arco
description: Parking day and night, possibility to take the funicular to go to visit Bom Jesus.

title: (4830) Fonte Arcada e Oliveira - Unnamed Road
title_short: (4830) Fonte Arcada e Oliveira - Unnamed Road
description: Water fountain

title: (4730) - 534 N101
description: Large park, no problem staying overnight

title: (4715) Braga -
description: Area with picnic tables and lots of trees! there's a little church.

title: (4840-120) Terras de Bouro - 8 N205-3
description: Clear drinking water tastes good!

title: (4730) Vila Verde - Oriz Santa Marinha
description:
Very calm and quiet near the river. 
There is a bathroom with shower (Cold river water)
A bit far from everything but a nature paradise.

title: (4710-404) Braga - 39 Avenida dos Lusíadas
description: Free public parking. Without services. A little away from the center (20 minutes on foot to the Cathedral) but very useful during the month of June, because with the parties it is impossible to park in the center.

title: (4715) Braga - 3 N309
description: Parking near the sanctuary with many places.

title: (4710-340) Braga - 157 Rua da Quinta da Armada
title_short: (4710-340) Braga - 157 Rua da Quinta da Armada
description: Parking to go to Braga Parque 2 minutes on foot, secure enough we parked there 2 afternoons without worries.

title: (4715-616) Braga - 44 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
title_short: (4715-616) Braga - 44 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
description: Public toilets with plenty of parking space, picnic table and the beautiful Nossa sanctuary

title: (4715-616) Braga - 88 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
title_short: (4715-616) Braga - 88 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
description:
Shady earth parking accessible to any size motorhome with garbage cans and toilets a point to eat closed on March 28, 2023 many quiet picnic tables for the night 200 meters from the sanctuary of Our Lady of Sameiro
It is one of the most visited places of Marian devotion in Portugal

title: (4730) Lugar da Portela - 504 N101
description: water source. Guted water, doesn't taste like chlorine.

title: (4715-616) Braga - 15 Avenida do Santuārio
description: Place Authorized by the GNR (Local Authority) to stay overnight, the other parks do not allow us to stay overnight.

title: (4715-616) Braga - 44 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
title_short: (4715-616) Braga - 44 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Sameiro
description: Very large car park in front of the sanctuary, a little flatter than the neighboring car parks. Fountain and picnic tables nearby. The sanctuary rings from 7 o'clock.

title: (4830) - 259 EM1375
description: Access point to drinking water without other services. parking for olive river beach access. 4kms to diver Lanhoso (Adventure Park)

title: (4730) - 101 Avenida do Autarca
description: Near school. Very calm, large and safe park.

title: (4730) - 236 Avenida Professor Machado Vilela
description: Large place with shelter. Very safe and quiet. Near police and fire department.

title: (4710-487) Braga -
description: Flat illuminated parking spaces of approximately 5.50 m each. on a quiet road. At the rear a supermarket and a pasteleria.

title: (4715-213) Braga - 19 Rua da Fábrica
description: Free park, day and night, all vehicles. Near playground, near cycling line to city center. 20 minutes walking and 5min bus stop to city center. Shadow or sun, night lighting, safe place, near shopping  centre. Public wc. But a bit noisy from the roads.

title: (4715-279) Braga - 26 Rua António de Mariz
description: Makro retail supermarket parking lot. It has many parking spaces.

title: (4840) - EM535
description: Water point direction from Terras do bourro to Parada do bourro

title: (4700-045) Dume - 30 Rua António Alves Rei
description: Parking with very wide and long spaces near a playground. not far from a large shopping center. calm night

title: (4805) Briteiros - N309
description: Quiet location, right on the Citania de Briteiros. No service.

title: () Braga - N309
description:
Water point. 
Seems to be fresh and clear.

title: (4830) Santo Emilião - 7 N310
description: Very quiet day and night parking on the parking lot of the water fountain at 30M provide a big end but the free wc behind the small entrance building close at 8pm possible to sleep on the church parking if the other is full may be close to the road.

title: (4715-343) Braga - 79 Rua José António Cruz
description: “Ja Abriu” - Laundry - Self service. Very clean. 1 x 11kg and 1 x 18kg washing machines. 3 x drying machines. There is also ironing and clothes alteration service.

title: (4715-009) Braga -
description: Picnic area with parking places near the Ecovia (green way), around 10 min walking to the city centre. Just beside Rio Este (East River, a tiny river that passes through Braga but you can't see in the map.) The green way continues west from this point and reaches the park (S.Joao da Ponte) and east reaching a sports complex with public toilets. (Rodovia). there are drinking water spots all allong the Ecovia.

title: (4720) Seramil -
description: Nice quiet spot

title: (4715-249) Braga - 9/9A Avenida Robert Smith
description: Self serve laundry in the covered parking of Minho Shopping Centre. 2.5m height limit for undercover parking, 2.2m height limit for parking directly above, however parking lot just opposite next to car wash and fuel station with no height limit. Cash only (notes and coins) - or download the app to pay by phone. Discount card available for slight discount. Toilet, WiFi and multiple shopping possibilities in shopping centre above while you wait.

title: (4700-087) Braga - Parque Norte R. de Montecastro
title_short: (4700-087) Braga - Parque Norte R. de Montecastro
description: Large parking area for the football stadium. Parking and overnight accommodation except on stadium use days.

title: (4730-596) Turiz -
description: Water point we were able to fill our cans no precision if the water is drinkable

title: (4715-122) BRAGA - Praceta André Soares
description:
Free and quuet parking, with secure location. Near the entrance hall of the André Soares school. 
500 meters from the historic center.
In school period, better arrive after 18h.
Good for weekends.
Park back on the grass.

title: (4715-213) Braga - Praça Doutor Cândido da Costa Pires
title_short: (4715-213) Braga - Praça Doutor Cândido da Costa Pires
description:
Parking in front of a medical center.  Place paying for the day. Night not recommended because there is a disco: 'Sardinha Biba' from midnight to 7am. Not good.
The oder side of the street, its possible, near scool. Free.

address.street: Praça Doutor Cândido da Costa Pires

title: (4830-657) Santo Emilião - 40 Rua da Fábrica
description:
Between small parking and nature corner
there is just an establishment at the end that offers meals dance etc so a little noise but nothing very embarrassing
access is easy
the edge of the shady water nice for a small breaststroke for children.
poor road
the communal employees crossed on our arrival gave us the green light ...

free but no service

title: (4730) Vila de Prado - Avenida do Cávado
title_short: (4730) Vila de Prado - Avenida do Cávado
description: Vila de Prado, Cávado River, Nice river beach Faial Restaurant, Police and Health care near.

title: (4715) Braga - Rua Doutor Humberto Soeiro
description: Alternative location. Easy and good parking. 1 km from the historical center. Quiet place.

title: (4715-005) Braga - 37 Praça Araújo Carandá
description: Laundromat

title: (4840-100) Terras de Bouro - 70 Rua Aquilino Pereira
title_short: (4840-100) Terras de Bouro - 70 Rua Aquilino Pereira
description: Small flat free parking adapted only to fitted vans. Perfect for a night's trouble. According to traders, there is more suitable parking for larger vehicles, near the police station, not far from it.

title: (4730) Mós - 483 EM537
description: Just a small day parking to stop to eat or rest a little ...quiet and noiseless....

title: (4840-100) Terras de Bouro - 26 Largo da República
title_short: (4840-100) Terras de Bouro - 26 Largo da República
description: Large, well-lit car park with playground. At 50m from the center (bakery, supermarket, ...) Double checked by police and were allowed to stay overnight. Ideal location if you want to do nice mountain bike routes or hikes in the area. We stayed on Oct 28 with a campervan.

title: (4715-213) Braga - 37 Rua Santo Adrião
description: Parking of the adventure park, away from the city, about 10 minutes by car. Calm. Cafeteria and activity park

title: (4700) Frossos - 72 Rua Quinta da Goja
description: Quiet place near schools and sports center. Without noises

title: (4850) Cerdeirinhas - 48 Avenida Entroncamento
description: Good easy parking close to Adelaide, best restaurant in the area. Mandatory stop on the way to Geres for cod or ribs

title: (4705) Braga - Avenida Doutor Francisco Pires Gonçalves
title_short: (4705) Braga - Avenida Doutor Francisco Pires Gonçalves
description: Free public park. Close to the historical center (600 meters). Avoid days of heavy rain and wind. Complicated in the month of June - Festivities of the city - São João and in the days of weekly fair (Tuesday). Easy access to sunrise or sunset. Local with some noise. Lots of shade in the summer.

title: (4730-450) Prado - 23 Largo Antunes Lima
description:
São Sebastião, Vila de Prado      
Terça-feira de manhã é dia de feira semanal -
Tuesday morning is weekly market day -
Le mardi matin est le jour du marché hebdomadaire - El martes por la mañana es el día de mercado semanal

title: (4705-097) Braga - 130 Rua do Fujacal
description: Self service laundry

title: (4730-458) Vila de Prado - N201
description: Fuel pump. Supermarket. Washing machine. The bakery. kiosk. ATM

title: (4700-216) Braga - 9 Rua Cónego Doutor António José Ribeiro
title_short: (4700-216) Braga - 9 Rua Cónego Doutor António José Ribeiro
description: Self service laundry

address.street: 9 Rua Cónego Doutor António José Ribeiro

title: (4700) Merelim (São Paio) - 36 Rua João Dias Soares
title_short: (4700) Merelim (São Paio) - 36 Rua João Dias Soares
description: It is a parking lot on a river beach. To spend the night it is quiet but in non-summer months as it will be very crowded. Ideal for vans and AC no more than 6m. The squares are not very big.

title: (4830-290) Póvoa de Lanhoso - 436 N207-4
description: A nice toolshop where you can buy/change your Campingaz 907 and 904 bottles. Lovely people and close to an awesome campsite! Beware, only cash.

title: (4700-028) Braga - 11 Rua Damião de Góis
description: Perfect for seeing the city. It is 1 normal paid parking and has few spaces, but AC fits and the location is very good

name: GarfePark Camping
title: (4830-291) GarfePark Camping
description: GPS position not exact but indicated by signs, access not very wide complicated for large motorhomes modern and very clean sanitary facilities

title: (4700-034) Braga - 523 Avenida da Imaculada Conceição
description:
It is Lidl parking.
Very good spot to walk to the center of Braga, it is only 10 minutes and you do not have to enter narrow streets

title: (4715) Braga - N309
description: Amazing and very peaceful place. Lots of stone picnic benches. Right next to a pretty amazing church that is no longer in use with stunning views of all of Braga. Shady and flat places. A large space also with access to walks. It seems unlikely to be able to sleep on this place and yet we have the right to park where we want. There is room for many motorhomes and for all types despite a bumpy path going up in the ground.

title: (4840) Vilar -
description: Nice spot to park undisturbed and spend a few hours or a night. It is a parking area well built and spacious to host cars, campers or larger motorhomes (in this case, there may be place for two of these only). It is attached to a minor road and the starting point of a nice walking path through the forest and by the river.

title: (4850) Lapa - Unnamed Road
description: Senhora da Lapa Church. Quiet parking with grassy flat. Most: a beautiful trail to climb the viewpoint with exceptional views. No service. To access it, go through the village of Soutelo.

name: Camping Braga
title: () Camping Braga
description: Small, very basic campsite with access to the municipal swimming pool directly below. Ideal for visiting the historic center. Device for emptying the motorhome. The campsite is well shaded. Friendly staff. Places for mobile homes and tents, wooden cabins. Good to start. Sanitary building in the upper part of the square is clean, but outdated. New sanitary building in the lower part of the square was great. Cooking areas, ovens, rental refrigerators. 5 Stars.

title: (4700) Real - 513 Rua 5 de Outubro
description: 3 places for motorhomes in the parking lot of a shopping center, in uber about 4 euros to the center.

title: (4730-452) Vila de Prado - 22 Travessa da Fontainha
title_short: (4730-452) Vila de Prado - 22 Travessa da Fontainha
description: Location in the shade under the trees to rest and eat in front of the water and a kiwi field. Flat ground - please leave the area clean.

title: (4705) Esporões -
description:
Lightly accessible by vans, fully accessible 4x4. NOT accessible by motorhome.

Incredible view, no street noise

title: (4730-452) Vila de Prado - 22 Travessa da Fontainha
title_short: (4730-452) Vila de Prado - 22 Travessa da Fontainha
description: Flat, grassy terrain with plenty of places to stand. No prohibition sign. Very quiet because at the end of a road. Local fishermen are there as are young lovers trying to count flowers in their car. You are at the water's edge and under the trees. Hard to get over !!! Also, the photos of the place in front (paved parking lot) were probably taken there. Please keep this place clean as it is only 15 minutes from Braga.

title: (4705-259) Braga - 37 Rua dos Presidentes
description: Really great laundry!

title: (4700) Braga - 32 Rua de Ruães
description: Beautiful quiet and flat location on a paved surface. Fantastic view of the river Cávado with many picnick tables on the grass. There are plenty of trees but also open places to park the camper (bus). The road there is narrow but accessible. No facilities such as water and electricity.

title: () Braga - A11
description: GPL station in Braga

title: (4705-185) Braga - 3 Travessa da Ilha
description: Self Service Laundry at Intermarche Braga.

title: (4700) Parada de Tibães - R. de Sao Goncalo
title_short: (4700) Parada de Tibães - R. de Sao Goncalo
description: Clean and very recent laundry room with WC and wifi. Payment only in cash.

title: (4700-222) Ferreiros - 37 Praceta do Magistério
description: Laundromat

title: (4705) Esporões - Unnamed Road
description: On top of a mountain with very nice views and plenty of parking spots. There are chapels, there is a big monument and picknick benches all around. We we're here on 1st of January 2020 and there were locals going for walks at daytime, but at nighttime it was very quiet. Good and safe place! No services in winter. Looks like in summer it could be more active.

title: (4840) - 83 CM1149
description: Parking entrance to Mesquito village with picnic table with view in the distance and a few houses, no service. We stayed here for one night. You can find cows typical of the region there.

title: (4845-028) Rio Caldo - 99 N304
description: Small drinking water tap on the side of the road. Parking space nearby. Only to fill a few cans. Don't think about hooking up your hose. ..

title: (4845-028) Braga - n 45 Rua 1
description: Motorhome area. We were in mid-September and we were alone, a quiet place near the town of Río Caldo.

title: (4820) Agrela - 98 Avenida de Santa Cristina
description: Field, parking in front of a small pond. perfect for cooling off. A little wooded, next to the church.

title: (4845-028) Braga -
description: Semi-flat place, very little slope, with capacity for about 3 large vehicles. Parking next to the river, with a beach area for swimming. Quiet night listening to the river water. Access by paved road, to the car park. Complicated access for vehicles over 8m and 4 meters high, but at night with little traffic it can be practicable. During the day it is a bathing place for some residents, they usually park on the same road.

name: Pichoses Camping
title: (4845-013) Pichoses Camping
description: Pichoses Camping Terras de Bouro Manages Private service area under development, very friendly welcome from the boss who speaks French.

title: (4845) -
description: Very nice spot to spend the night, without any problem more advice for off-road cars

title: (4845-013) Rio Caldo - 37 N308
description: En: Free car park in front of a campsite. We dined with the table and Chair in the open air, passed the GNR in the parking lot and did not stop. It is by the road so it may bother anyone who sleeps in the morning or who has the sleep easily disturbed. We sleep like babies. It has a restaurant and grocery store near and even closer to a park with Nick pick area and exercise machines

title: (4845) Rio Caldo - Unnamed Road
description: It’s a bulky road but my corsa got through the spot is located directly at the road but only the fire brigade used the road at night you can have a refreshing bath in the sea. You’ll find a lot of those places at this road just drive along till you find your spot

title: (4705-265) Braga - Unnamed Road
description:
Laundromat, a little expensive.
located behind Leclerc, parking accessible by going around

title: (4805-015) Prazins (Santa Eufémia) - 2024 Rua Manuel Ribeiro
description: Barco's Lazer Park car park. Swimming possible in Rio Ave.

title: (4805) Sande (São Martinho) - 16 Largo do Assento
description: Very spacious place ideal for parking and pernoita. It is possible to supply water by asking the owner of the adjoining house.

title: (4700-565) Mire de Tibães -
description: Possibility of day and night parking at the entrance to the esplanade before the entrance to the “Tibaes monastery”. The monastery to visit (3 stars in the backpacker's guide) also has a possibility of accommodation (hotel). Very calm…

title: (4700) Mire de Tibães - CM1321
description: Parking to visit the splendid monastery. Attention closing on Monday

title: () Vilar da Veiga - 645 Rua ER 205-5
description: 10 m from a river beach with boat rental and watercraft without service

title: (4730) - EM1148-2
description: Chapel on the side of the road, with a couple of shaded flat parking lots. Quiet place and good views, perfect to rest. With covered porch.

title: (4805) Caldelas - R.do Fogueteiro
description: Flat and calm place

title: (4700) Mire de Tibães - Av. de Rio
title_short: (4700) Mire de Tibães - Av. de Rio
description: Nice shaded spot for a swim, lunch or a quite night. There is a small bar (from the local football club) for drinks. Owner offered us electricity for the night! Disadvantage is the church opposite the river Csvado that is very loud at 8 o'clock.

title: (4805-108) Caldelas - 226 Rua dos Cutileiros
description: Picnic area with table, barbecue, soccer field, volleyball court. Swimming possible in the Agrela river.

title: (4805) Caldelas - 449 Rua do Comandante Carvalho Crato
title_short: (4805) Caldelas - 449 Rua do Comandante Carvalho Crato
description: On the Intermarche - Perfect for water and drain services, only two parking spaces

title: (4730-360) - 35 EM532
description: Calm place to pass a noite, next to igreja

title: (4845-075) Vilar da Veiga -
description: Spectacular site at the top of the pitch with great views and easy access. Do not stay overnight

name: Le camping Caldas das Taipas
title: (4805-156) Le camping Caldas das Taipas
description: The municipal campsite Caldas das Taipas is next to the city park, the swimming pool and a sports hall. It is only open in the summer season, the reception welcomes you from 8am to 11pm. we were pleasantly surprised the sanitary facilities are brand new and very clean. Too bad the showers are not very hot

title: (4845) Vilar da Veiga - 25 Rua ER 205-5
description: Open land parking, with about 15 seats, we spent two nights in our caravan without problem, along with another van. Opposite there is a river beach where you can rent kayaks, paddle surf, and pedal boats. Next door there are beach bars and restaurants. It is attached to the road, some traffic at night.

title: (4845-075) Vilar da Veiga -
description: Small nice place with a view where you can park at 2. Quiet away from the world! We were alone with the beach n bottom at the top

name: Parque de Campismo de Aboim da Nóbrega
title: (4730) Parque de Campismo de Aboim da Nóbrega
title_short: (4730) Parque de Campismo de Aboim da Nóbrega
description: Mountain Camping of Aboim da Nobrega, Vila Verde

title: (4705-444) Celeirós - 87 Avenida de São Lourenço
description: Self service wash and dry

title: (4845) - Unnamed Road
description:
Attention: national park!
it is therefore forbidden to park/overnight here.

Nice view next to the water reservoir below a quiet road. We spent a very comfortable night there to make a small fire. 300 m passable route, possible in an equipped van, impossible in a motorhome!

title: (4850) Vieira do Minho - Unnamed Road
description: Excellent parking. Quiet place with a beautiful view of Geres. The road to reach it is unpaved and disconnected but practicable (we did it with a city car). We did not meet anyone except three motorcyclists.

title: (4820) Travassós -
description: Small park with a splendid view! Picnic table, small chapel.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Rudimentary parking place but flat. A breathtaking view of the mountains at 360 °

title: (4845-075) Vilar da Veiga - 185 Rua ER 205-5
description: Amazing place! best hidden spot 2meters from the lake! place only for one or two cars. no amenities. at the morning there is a guy coming with canoes but no problems with that.

title: (4820) Travassós -
description: Flat, calm, open view, 4G ok, easy to access. We spent a peaceful night. The road in the distance is not very busy. Depending on the direction of the wind, you can hear the original bell tower of a church in the distance. The place is clean please take care of it.

title: (4845-075) Vilar da Veiga -
description: Small flat site slightly set back from the road. Magnificent view and few passages on the road at night.

title: () Mosteiro -
description: Very nice picnic/lunch stop by a bridge and a running stream

title: (4800) - 1220 Rua Portelinha
description: Small roadside parking lot with little traffic. Nice and quiet view for the night. Slight slope but with the holds no problems. Facing a cute church whose bell tower remains silent at night. It nevertheless resumes at 7 a.m. so perfect if you take the road early, perhaps annoying if you get up late. No dogs barking at night, which seems to be rare enough in the area to clarify this.

name: Ponte Saltos Campismo
title: (4845-075) Ponte Saltos Campismo
description: Nice small campsite, beautiful shade under olive trees, access to the lake. In the summer holidays many local guests, friendly welcome, simple but clean sanitary facilities. Steep, narrow access road

title: (4840-040) Carvalheira - 4 CM1259
description: Point for a possible stop for lunch and possibility to fill up with tap water from the cemetery opposite

name: Camping Cabreira Park
title: (4850-073) Camping Cabreira Park
description: Campsite Cabreira Park! Shaded campsite surrounded by a stream, unmarked pitches, flat areas, service options, restaurant and swimming pool.

title: (4850) - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet and slightly lost corner, shaded in the evening and in the morning. Advance in the path until the start of 2 other paths. Small lamp post hide in the trees but which does not interfere in any way for the night

title: (4850) - 141 CM1409
description: Small quiet parking lot. Located near the town of Vieira, this place is rather flat, access is difficult for campsites. Easily accessible to commercial vehicles. The point of view is pleasant. Attention no water point or electricity. Have a good stay.

title: (4980-020) São João Baptista de Vila Chã -
title_short: (4980-020) São João Baptista de Vila Chã -
description: Magnificent point of view in height to access it only 4 wheel drive it climbs anyway. 2 access road on the north side impossible to climb on the south side it's good in 4 months driving

address.city: São João Baptista de Vila Chã

title: (4730) - 187 N101
description: I especially wanted to indicate this place for its drinking fountain in drinking water (known locally) that can serve well when there is little reserve and camp nature.

title: (4845-075) Vilar da Veiga - Unnamed Road
description:
Viewpoint over the national park and the valley with picnic tables.
We only stayed there to eat but I think it is possible to stay the night there out of season.
The road passes right next to it but there is very little traffic

name: Camping Vale dos Moinhos
title: (4845-075) Camping Vale dos Moinhos
description: Nice campsite with lots of shade on an old water mill site, actually specializing in tents. terraced. Campers with more than 6m will certainly find it difficult. In addition, the driveway is narrow and steep. Good sanitary facilities.

title: (4850) - N304
description: Beautiful beach, with shading, on the lake, lawn and lake on each side, ski lift for wakeboarding at 50 m, few people the day, nobody at night, small bar with draft beer, seen at the top, access a bit difficult, dirt road on 100 m but do not hesitate to go to the very bottom. Lake water very clean and warm at will

title: (4730) Escariz (São Martinho) - 7 EM540
description: Parking place at the foot of a beautiful church. Very calm. No church bells between 10 p.m. and 7 p.m.

title: (4850) Figueiro - N304
description: Close to a road that goes to a river beach. good place to rest or spend a night. without any kind of service. quiet and shady

title: (4750) Lama -
description: Source - Fonte da Poça. very idyllic spot in the middle of the forest just before Braga. A small nature and adventure area has been created around the source. All made very cute. Everywhere paths and paths that invite you to walk and cycle. The last end of the trail is off-road, but should be passable even with normal cars. With the ground clearance of a van or SUV you can definitely get here. The place is perhaps only suitable to a limited extent for overnight stays, as there is not much room to stand. But beautifully secluded in the forest.

title: (4840-070) Cibões -
description: Place with wonderful view in nature. Near national park, but not in.

title: (4840-070) Figuereido - 359 CM1149
description: We spent one night and very quiet. With beautiful views.

title: (4845) - CM1276
description: Water fountain

title: (4850) Albufeira da Barragem - Albufeira da Barragem do
title_short: (4850) Albufeira da Barragem - Albufeira da Barragem do
description: Really nice place next to the lake. There is a small bar, nothing else apart from that. Stayed one night, we were the only ones, absolute silence, no disturbances. Also very calm in the morning. The access road is asphalt, but is a sloppy one.

title: (4730-420) Rio Mau - 104 EM1158
description:
Quiet, shady location, picnic tables, playground for children, possibility to walk in nature, supermarket with everything you need (meat, fish, fresh food) and bakery 50 meters away, municipal swimming pools of Ribeira do Neiva at 1 km, with the possibility of parking for the motorhome, service area/fuel pump at 1km,
Place with welcoming people and very peaceful!

title: (4850) Guilhofrei - Unnamed Road
description: Small corner for two vehicles possible, in the woods at the edge of the water.

title: (4845) - Estrada Florestal
description:
Simple parking space to sleep a night. There are only 3 simple parking spaces. If you look for a place to stay longer this is probably not a valid option. 

But it is very quiet in the night (main season), you are on the middle of the nature and you hear a lot of animals. 
Also the hiking path GR50 starts at the parking lot. Maybe during the day hikers are coming.

title: (4845) - Estrada Florestal
description: At the soccer field there are a few possibilities to stand with larger or smaller vehicles, either at the parking lot (a bit uneven) or on the path in front of it (2 very good spots, on the picture). It is half way up the slope. It was very quiet, almost no one came by, I recommend it Especially for vans. Starting point for GR hikes.

title: (4850) Louredo -
description: Super spot in the mountains, accessible by a forest path (only van and light vehicle, not suitable for motorhomes). We arrive on a plateau with a magnificent view. Around the picnic area, several secluded places to sleep one night without being disturbed. Water point (no indication if it is drinkable or not)

title: (4845) Lugar da Ermida - 28 CM1276
description: Nice place with a nice view. There is even an area for the barbecue which is protected against the rain. Benches are also available. No overnight parking.

title: (4845-075) Gerês - 40 Rua Arnaçó
description: Parking at the top of the town of Geres just above the cemetery and at the edge of the road. places with more or less slope. the seats are very large.

title: (4845) Vilar da Veiga - Unnamed Road
description: Follow the road that leads to the Pedra Bela mirador, arriving at the top, you will come across a magnificent view overlooking the valley. The viewpoint is right next to the small car park, breathtaking panorama. Ideal for landscaped van, may be too small for large motorhomes.  The only visits we had were tourists who came to enjoy the view.

title: () - EM533
description: Parking in the heart of Geres Park. Water point available.

title: (4800) Fermentões - 64 Rua das Coradeiras de Baixo
title_short: (4800) Fermentões - 64 Rua das Coradeiras de Baixo
description: Pic nic al lado del rio hay un Puente Romano fuente mesas barbacoa

title: (4750-000) Porto -
description: There are some showers that belong to the restaurant. You leave them an identification document and they give you the key. There are separate men's and women's restrooms.

title: (4840) - N307
description: The way you take at the start of the dike, is a very quiet place in which only the water from the dam is heard while running. The tourist office of the natural park is less than a kilometer away for information of the Roman Empire road, bicycle and hiking routes.

title: (4750-000) Porto - Autoestrada A3
description:
Service area with tree-lined picnic area.

There are also free showers with hot water.
Ask in the restaurant near the gas station for shower keys.

title: (4850) - CM1395
description: Parking with beautiful views next to the Louredo cemetery, about 2/3 level spaces, but 100 meters further back there is a large esplanade with room for more with a certain difference in level. There is a container next to the cemetery gate and a water tap on the left side of it. The road to get there is narrow, check before starting the Google Maps routes through this area as they send you through impossible turns for medium-sized vans.

name: Ermida Gerês Camping
title: (4845-072) Ermida Gerês Camping
description: Family campsite, owner speaks French and English very well and is very nice. Sanitary facilities very clean, no hot water in the basin for the dishes and no toilet seats. Camping very well located for visiting the waterfalls and hiking. Motorhome no more than 8 meters. Free WiFi.

title: (4845) - 53 CM1276
description: Parking of the mirador of the village of Ermida. The national gendarmerie told us as OK. Good for a night and nice for breakfast. Supermarket and bar 100 meters away.

title: (4840-030) Campo do Gerês - 101 Rua Geira
description: Small parking lot to which we were brought by the rangers' feedback.

title: (4820) - Rua das Leiras
description: Free parking at the entrance of the park, after the camping, leading to the dam, shaded. Good for one night, it is only a parking lot ...

title: (4845-075) - 131 Rua Tude de Sousa
description: Free parking day and night without service. Visit the spa town 3 minutes, very quiet at night.

name: Foxtrot Adventure
title: (4820) Foxtrot Adventure
description: It's a great place to stay, for many days, because there is a lot to see! There is a great team of host, they will help you with everything, or guide you to the right places. The accomodations are always clean and are updated! They also have a outdoorsports organasation, a lot of things to do at the lake and in the mountains surrounding the campsite I recomend this place to everyone, you or old, their things to do for everyone!

title: (4845-072) Gerês - 219 CM1276
description: Ample parking in the city hermitage parking lot.  Difficult access for a section of the descent with a mobile home of more than 7 meters

title: (4800-073) Azurém - 442 Rua Teixeira de Pascoais
description: Laundromat with wifi

title: (4810) Guimarães - 36 Rua de Dona Mafalda
description:
Very large free parking in front of the castle. Lots of trees and shaded places. No parking from 21:00 to 07:00.

Ps: this is NOT the battlefield of the battle of Sao Mamede. Google Maps lies :>>

title: (4845) Caldas de Gerez - N308-1
description: Shaded picnic area with many stone and wooden tables. Attention difficult to park, winding road and cobblestones.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 15 Rua Dona Urraca
description: It is a fairly wide street where you can stop the motorhome, without traffic and overlooking the castle of Guimaraës. It is very quiet, the only thing that you can not park from 9:00 pm to 7:00 am, so you can not stay overnight. 50 meters from the castle.

title: (4845) - N308-1
description: Nice parking just 1km from Vila do Geres centre.

title: (4705) São Pedro De Oliveira - Tv. da Volta do Carro
title_short: (4705) São Pedro De Oliveira - Tv. da Volta do Carro
description: The parking lot of a free public swimming pool (9am-10pm) with many tables and benches and a grill. There is also a kiosk selling ice cream and drinks on site. However, this is not always open. Officially, however, this is only for the residents of the area. The front parking lot is easy to see and sunny, the rear one is a bit quieter and shady.

title: (4800-073) Guimarães -
description: Large public car park at Guimaraes football stadium. Supermarket and old center 5 minutes walk.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Tarmac and flat platform, beautiful setting, quiet and quiet night, no service.

title: (4800-432) Guimarães - 1 Largo Martins Sarmento
description: Next to palace drinking fountain for water bottles

name: Vidoeiro Geres Camping
title: (4845) Vidoeiro Geres Camping
description: Campsite in the middle of nature. Beautiful with the river that flows there. Even possibility to immerse. There is room for campers, vans and tents. All facilities available.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 354 Rua Professor Egas Moniz
description: Shaded street and flat to spend the day and night. Attention garage on the cob so difficult for more than six meters. Park and city center nearby.

name: Parque Cerdeira
title: (4840-030) Parque Cerdeira
description:
Good área with all of conditions 
very quiet and very good

title: (4980-741) São João Batista de Vila Chã - CM1345
title_short: (4980-741) São João Batista de Vila Chã - CM1345
description:
New parking area next to the museo do quartzo.
Barbecue spots and a public toilet open during the day. Could get busy with pilgrims on the weekend.

address.city: São João Batista de Vila Chã

title: (4845) Vilar da Veiga - Unnamed Road
description: A very nice place, but only has space for 2 campers (mobile homes are not suitable). There are trash cans as well as spring water. There are 4 picnic tables under the trees. Absolutely quiet, near the waterfall and various hiking trails. In March it was deserted, but the temperature was very pleasant.

title: (4840) - N307
description: Small parking with beautiful views of the lake and mountains, along a road with little traffic. Two flat pitches At 1km from the start of a super hike of 18km and 1200 m of elevation to the Serra Amarela in loop by the ridges and the lake.

title: (4850) Ruivães -
description: The place is ideal for one night. Traffic after 7 p.m. is almost non-existent. Relatively flat area.

title: (4840) - N307
description: Small parking by the road wihout any service. We spend there only 30minutes but it is no problem to stay overnight.

title: (4845) - Unnamed Road
description: Only in the world (end of March). Parking near the waterfall do arado. 10 places. Beautiful view of the park Geres., No car came! Night prohibited.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 220C Parque das Hortas
description: The other parking was used for a funfair, so we took this car park. I only recommend it in case of emergency, it is very noisy. Do not hesitate to use the cable car to explore the old town ...

title: (4805) Guimarães - Rua dos Carvalhais
description: Decathlon parking. 10 minutes from the historic center. In the city we park relatively close to the center.

title: (4810) Guimarães - Rua do Rei Pegu
description:
Parking area in cord. Free parking. One way street and very well located.
We have been here two days and no problem.
At the foot of the funicular and 15 minutes walking, with children of the Castle.

title: (4810-025) Guimarães - Rua do Rei Pegu
description: Day parking for long vehicles, ideal for visiting the city, about 15 minutes from the center on foot. Busy during the day and without services.

title: (4835-010) Guimarães - 703 Rua Professor Abel Salazar
description: Free parking spaces, at the front of the apartments, suitable for small camper vans <6 mtr. On the other side a large shopping center.

title: (4805) Guimarães - 601 Rua de São Miguel
description: Large flat and open parking lot at empty industrial hall. Apparently free to use for parking.

title: (4810) Guimarães - Rua Bernardino Jordão
description: Day / night parking on dirt adjacent to the official parking area. Suitable if you have vehicles longer than 6.5 meters. A short distance away (50 meters) there are the loading and unloading columns of the parking area. The historic center is about 8-10 minutes on foot
